mapper.update:
update inv_lot_loc_id set
locationid=#{locationid},
traceid=#{traceid},
customerid=#{customerid},
sku=#{sku},
qty=#{qty},
qtyallocated=#{qtyallocated},
qtyrpin=#{qtyrpin},
qtyrpout=#{qtyrpout},
qtymvin=#{qtymvin},
qtymvout=#{qtymvout},
qtyonhold=#{qtyonhold},
addtime=#{addtime},
addwho=#{addwho},
edittime=#{edittime},
editwho=#{editwho},
netweight=#{netweight},
grossweight=#{grossweight},
cubic=#{cubic},
price=#{price},
onholdlocker=#{onholdlocker},
lpn=#{lpn},
qtypa=#{qtypa},
where lotnum=#{lotnum}
mapper.delete: delete from inv_lot_loc_id where lotnum = #{lotnum} and locationid = #{locationid}
mapper.select: select from inv_lot_loc_id where lotnum = #{lotnum} and locationid = #{locationid}

SELECT i.*,a.lotatt03,DATE_ADD(a.lotatt03,INTERVAL s.reservedfield10 DAY) lotatt03test,s.reservedfield10,p.qty1,p.packuom1 FROM `inv_lot_loc_id` i INNER JOIN `bas_sku` s ON i.customerid=s.customerid AND i.sku=s.sku INNER JOIN`inv_lot_att` a ON a.lotnum=i.lotnum INNER JOIN bas_package p ON p.packid=s.packid INNER JOIN `doc_asn_header` h ON a.lotatt14=h.asnno WHERE h.asntype='PR' AND i.locationid NOT IN('STAGE01','SORTATION01','YY-01-01-01','DX-01-01-01') AND s.reservedfield10 IS NOT NULL AND s.reservedfield10 <> ''

select a.* from inv_lot_loc_id a left join inv_lot_att b on a.lotnum = b.lotnum where a.locationid = #{locationid} and IFNULL(b.lotatt04,'') = IFNULL(rtrim(#{lotatt04}),'') and IFNULL(b.lotatt05,'') = IFNULL(rtrim(#{lotatt05}),'')

SELECT aa.*,p.name FROM (SELECT a.`lotatt04`,a.`lotatt05`,i.locationid,i.`sku`,i.`customerid`,SUM(i.`qty`) AS qty FROM `inv_lot_loc_id` i INNER JOIN `inv_lot_att` a ON a.`lotnum`=i.`lotnum` GROUP BY a.`lotatt04`,a.`lotatt05`,i.locationid,i.`sku`,i.`customerid`) AS aa LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=aa.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=aa.`customerid` LEFT JOIN product_line p ON s.customerid = p.customerid AND s.sku_group1 = p.product_line_id where 1=1
and aa.lotatt04 like concat('%',#{lotatt04},'%')
and aa.lotatt05 like concat('%',#{lotatt05},'%')
and aa.customerid like concat('%',#{customerid},'%')
and aa.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%')
and p.name like concat('%',#{productLineName},'%')
ORDER BY aa.locationid DESC

select a.* from inv_lot_loc_id a left join inv_lot_att b on a.lotnum = b.lotnum where locationid = #{locationid} order by a.customerid, a.sku, b.lotatt04, b.lotatt05, b.lotatt10 limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
